name: Rainforest Alliance
goal: The Rainforest Alliance is an international non-profit organization working in more than 60 countries at the intersection of business, agriculture and forests. We are building an alliance to create a better future for people and nature by making responsible business the new normal.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: The Rainforest Alliance follows the policy areas of agriculture, food labeling, public procurement, sustainable development, human rights and related subjects.
